ValidationRule.description: If the Activity Type = Invoice/Disputes, then Customer_PO/RO_Number field becomes mandatory.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,'Invoice Disputes'), ISBLANK(Customer_PO_RO_WONumber__c ), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Origin , 'Web') )) && $RecordType.Name !='CSM Toolbox' && not(ispickval(Status,'Cancelled')) && $Profile.Name !='System Administrator' && NOT( ISPICKVAL(Status,'Closed as Duplicate') ) && $User.Id !='005300000042rPL' && $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a value for Customer PO/RO/WO Number.
